channel.title: CVE Feed for Unlimited Elements -- Unlimited Elements For Elementor (Free Widgets, Addons, Templates)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unlimited Elements -- Unlimited Elements For Elementor (Free Widgets, Addons, Templates)

item.title: CVE-2024-49271|2024-10-16T14:18:55.663Z -- unlimited%20elements -- unlimited%20elements%20for%20elementor%20%28free%20widgets%2C%20addons%2C%20templates%29
item.description: : Improper Neutralization of Special Elements Used in a Template Engine vulnerability in Unlimited Elements Unlimited Elements For Elementor (Free Widgets, Addons, Templates) allows : Command Injection.This issue affects Unlimited Elements For Elementor (Free Widgets, Addons, Templates): from n/a through 1.5.121.

item.title: CVE-2024-45454|2024-10-07T13:09:32.272Z -- unlimited%20elements -- unlimited%20elements%20for%20elementor%20%28free%20widgets%2C%20addons%2C%20templates%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Unlimited Elements Unlimited Elements For Elementor (Free Widgets, Addons, Templates) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Unlimited Elements For Elementor (Free Widgets, Addons, Templates): from n/a through 1.5.121.
